alert.note: Alert for Cherokee (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 06 at 11:52AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues on the Chattooga River near Gaylesville. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following county, Cherokee. * WHEN...Until noon CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Some nearby roads may be impassable due to flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1148 AM CDT, Emergency Management reported flooding in the warned area. Flooding is already occurring. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Cedar Bluff, Gaylesville, Cornwall Furnace Park, Eastern Weiss Lake, Western Weiss Lake and Fullerton.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
